TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ClientFormsAuthenticationMembershipProvider extends System.Web.Security.MembershipProvider

summary.span: 通过客户端应用程序服务实现窗体身份验证。

span.span: Enables forms authentication with client application services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用客户端应用程序服务通过 forms 身份验证来验证用户。You can use client application services to validate users by using forms authentication. 若要启用表单身份验证，请将应用程序配置为使用 类。To enable forms authentication, you configure your application to use the class. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：配置客户端应用程序服务](/dotnet/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services)。For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](/dotnet/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services). 配置后，可以通过调用方法来验证用户 `static` ，该方法在内部调用 方法。After configuration, you can validate users by calling the `static` method, which internally calls the method. Forms 身份验证要求用户通过应用程序提供的登录控件指定其凭据。Forms authentication requires that the user specify their credentials through login controls provided by your application. 可以检索凭据并将其传递给 方法。You can retrieve the credentials and pass them to the method. 你还可以传递空字符串或 `null` 使用凭据提供程序。You can also pass in empty strings or `null` to use a credentials provider. 凭据提供程序是 在应用程序配置文件中指定的实现。A credentials provider is an implementation specified in your application configuration file. 通常会实现 方法以显示登录对话框并返回填充的 对象。You will typically implement the method to display a login dialog box and return a populated object. 使用凭据提供程序，让你可以在多个应用程序间共享单点登录对话框。Using a credentials provider enables you to share a single login dialog box among multiple applications. 方法通过属性指示的登录服务对用户进行身份验证 。The method authenticates users through the login service indicated by the property. 通常，从应用程序配置文件和其他配置值检索属性的值。The value of the property is typically retrieved from the application configuration file along with other configuration values. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：配置客户端应用程序服务](/dotnet/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services)。For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](/dotnet/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services). 如果用户成功通过身份验证，则服务提供程序将 `static` 属性设置为新 的对象，该对象包含 包含用户信息的新对象。If the user is successfully authenticated, the service provider sets the `static` property to a new object that contains a new object that contains the user information. 如果为 应用程序配置了，则可以使用 对象从角色服务中检索用户角色信息。If a is configured for your application, you can use the object to retrieve user role information from the roles service. 您可以通过属性检索对当前实例的引用 `static` 。You can retrieve a reference to the current instance through the `static` property. 您可以使用成员资格提供程序引用直接调用 方法。You can use the membership provider reference to call the method directly. 此外，还需要成员资格提供程序引用来调用 方法，该方法在基类中不可用 。Additionally, you will need the membership provider reference to call the method, which is not available in the base class. 不能使用 类创建、删除或修改成员身份信息。You cannot use the class to create, delete, or modify membership information. 若要创建、删除或修改用户，必须更改服务器上登录服务的配置。To create, delete, or modify users, you must change the configuration of the login service on the server. ## Examples 下面的示例代码演示如何使用此方法通过实现来验证用户 。The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to validate the user by using an implementation. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#306](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#306)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#306](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#306)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)]扩展性模型调用 方法以 使用应用程序配置文件中的信息初始化。The [!INCLUDE[vstecasp](~/includes/vstecasp-md.md)] extensibility model calls the method to initialize the using information in your application configuration file. 此方法识别以下身份验证服务配置属性：This method recognizes the following authentication service configuration attributes: - `name` - `description` - `savePasswordHashLocally` - `credentialsProvider` - `connectionStringName` - `serviceUri` 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：配置客户端应用程序服务](/dotnet/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services)。For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](/dotnet/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services).

related.span: 如何：配置客户端应用程序服务

span.span: How to: Configure Client Application Services

MemberSignature.Value: public void Logout ();
.method public hidebysig instance void Logout() cil managed
Public Sub Logout ()
public: void Logout();
member this.Logout : unit -> unit

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法从 cookie 缓存中清除所有身份验证 cookie，并将属性重置 `static` 为 包含当前的对象 。The method clears all authentication cookies from the cookie cache and resets the `static` property to a object that contains the current . 调用此方法后，当前用户将不再通过客户端应用程序服务的身份验证。After you call this method, the current user is no longer authenticated for client application services. 这意味着你不能通过类 和通过类的设置来检索角色 。This means that you cannot retrieve roles through the class and settings through the class. 但是，因为用户可能具有有效的 Windows 标识，所以你仍可能会收到 `true` 来自如下代码的值： `Thread.CurrentPrincipal.Identity.IsAuthenticated` 。However, because the user might have a valid Windows identity, you might still receive a `true` value from code such as the following: `Thread.CurrentPrincipal.Identity.IsAuthenticated`. 若要确定是否为客户端应用程序服务对用户进行了身份验证，请确认 通过属性检索到的的属性值 `static` 是 引用。To determine whether the user is authenticated for client application services, confirm that the property value of the retrieved through the `static` property is a reference. 然后，检查 属性。Then, check the property. 若要对当前用户重新进行身份验证，请调用 方法或 `static` 方法。To reauthenticate the current user, call the method or the `static` method. ## Examples 下面的示例代码演示如何使用此方法注销用户。The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to log out the user. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#070](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Form1.cs#070)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#070](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Form1.vb#070)]

exception.span: 属性值为 ，并且成员资格提供程序无法访问身份验证服务。

span.span: The property value is and the membership provider is unable to access the authentication service.

Attribute.AttributeName: [get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")]
[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取或设置身份验证服务的 URI。

span.span: Gets or sets the URI of the authentication service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以 在应用程序代码中设置属性，但通常会在应用程序配置文件中设置该值。You can set the property in your application code, but you will typically set the value in your application configuration file. 这样，便可以在不重新编译代码的情况下更改服务位置。This enables you to change the service location without recompiling your code. ## Examples 下面的示例代码演示如何使用此属性以编程方式设置身份验证服务的位置。The following example code demonstrates how to use this property to programmatically set the authentication service location. 以编程方式设置服务位置时，必须指定完整的服务 URI，该 URI 将始终以 "Authentication_JSON_AppService axd" 结尾。When you set the service location programmatically, you must specify the complete service URI, which will always end with "Authentication_JSON_AppService.axd". [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#301](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#301)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#301](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#301)]

exception.span: 获取此属性时，未在应用程序配置文件中发现任何服务 URI，并且以前未设置过此属性。

span.span: When getting this property, no service URI was found in the application configuration file, and this property has not been previously set.

related.span: 如何：配置客户端应用程序服务

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能使用类创建、删除或修改用户信息 。You cannot create, delete, or modify user information by using the class.

Public Custom Event UserValidated As EventHandler(Of UserValidatedEventArgs)

member this.UserValidated : EventHandler<System.Web.ClientServices.Providers.UserValidatedEventArgs>
Public Event UserValidated As EventHandler(Of UserValidatedEventArgs)

summary.span: 在用户通过验证后发生。

span.span: Occurs when the user is validated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件仅在用户成功验证后发生。This event occurs only after the user is successfully validated. 你可以使用此事件来更新应用程序，以反映当前用户。You can use this event to update your application to reflect the current user. 例如，可以使用 属性在应用程序用户界面中显示用户 (UI) 的用户名。For example, you can use the property to display the user name in your application user interface (UI). 您可以通过调用方法以无提示方式重新验证用户 。You can silently revalidate users by calling the method. 因此，应避免使用 事件来显示侵入式 UI。Therefore, you should avoid using the event to display intrusive UI. 例如，不应使用 事件显示 "欢迎" 对话框。For example, you should not use the event to display a welcome dialog box. ## Examples 下面的示例代码演示如何使用此事件在窗体的标题栏中显示用户名。The following example code demonstrates how to use this event to display the user name in the title bar of a form. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#305](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#305)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#305](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#305)]

summary.span: 使用指定的凭据对用户进行身份验证。

span.span: Authenticates a user by using the specified credentials.

param.name: username
param.span: 要进行身份验证的用户的名称，或者 或 ，以便从配置此应用程序要使用的 实现中检索凭据。

span.span: The name of the user to authenticate, or or to retrieve credentials from the implementation that this application is configured to use.

param.name: password
param.span: 要进行身份验证的用户的密码。

span.span: The password of the user to authenticate.

summary.span: 使用指定的用户名和密码对用户进行身份验证。

span.span: Authenticates a user by using the specified user name and password.

returns.span: 如果用户已经过验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user was authenticated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用客户端应用程序服务通过 forms 身份验证来验证用户。You can use client application services to validate users by using forms authentication. 若要验证用户，通常会调用 `static` 方法，该方法在内部调用 方法。To validate users, you will typically call the `static` method, which internally calls the method. 或者，您可以直接调用此方法，如 "示例" 部分所示。Alternatively, you can call this method directly, as shown in the Example section. Forms 身份验证要求用户通过应用程序提供的登录控件指定其凭据。Forms authentication requires that the user specify their credentials through login controls provided by your application. 可以检索凭据并将其传递给 方法。You can retrieve the credentials and pass them to the method. 你还可以传递空字符串或 `null` 使用凭据提供程序。You can also pass in empty strings or `null` to use a credentials provider. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：使用客户端应用程序服务来实现用户登录](/dotnet/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-implement-user-login-with-client-application-services)。For more information, see [How to: Implement User Login with Client Application Services](/dotnet/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-implement-user-login-with-client-application-services). ## Examples 下面的示例代码演示如何使用此方法通过实现来验证用户 。The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to validate the user by using an implementation. 此示例要求将应用程序配置为使用凭据提供程序。This example requires that you to configure your application to use a credentials provider. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何：配置客户端应用程序服务](/dotnet/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services)。For more information, see [How to: Configure Client Application Services](/dotnet/framework/common-client-technologies/how-to-configure-client-application-services). [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#306](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#306)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#306](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#306)]

MemberSignature.Value: public bool ValidateUser (string username, string password, bool rememberMe);
.method public hidebysig instance bool ValidateUser(string username, string password, bool rememberMe) cil managed
Public Function ValidateUser (username As String, password As String, rememberMe As Boolean) As Boolean
public: bool ValidateUser(System::String ^ username, System::String ^ password, bool rememberMe);
override this.ValidateUser : string * string * bool -> bool

span.span: The name of the user to authenticate.

param.name: password
param.span: 要进行身份验证的用户的密码。

span.span: The password of the user to authenticate.

param.name: rememberMe
param.span: 如果为 ，则将密码的哈希值存储在本地数据缓存中，以便脱机使用或者在用户身份验证 Cookie 过期后自动重新进行身份验证；如果为 ，则禁用脱机登录，或者要求在 Cookie 过期后重新进行身份验证。

span.span: to store a hash of the password in the local data cache for offline use and for automatic reauthentication when the user authentication cookie expires; to disable offline login or to require users to reauthenticate when the cookie expires.

summary.span: 使用指定的用户名和密码对用户进行身份验证，并可以选择将密码的哈希值存储在本地数据缓存中。

span.span: Authenticates a user by using the specified user name and password, optionally storing a hash of the password in the local data cache.

returns.span: 如果用户已经过验证，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user was authenticated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用客户端应用程序服务通过 forms 身份验证来验证用户。You can use client application services to validate users by using forms authentication. 若要验证用户，通常会调用 `static` 方法，该方法在内部调用 方法。To validate users, you will typically call the `static` method, which internally calls the method. 或者，您可以直接调用 方法。Alternatively, you can call the method directly. `rememberMe`除了和值外，还可以调用此重载来传入值 `username` `password` 。You can call this overload to pass in a `rememberMe` value in addition to the `username` and `password` values. ## Examples 下面的示例代码演示如何使用此方法，通过使用应用程序代码中的登录控件来验证用户。The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to validate the user by using login controls in your application code. 此示例需要 名为的控件 `usernameTextBox` 、 名为的控件 `passwordTextBox` 和 名为的控件 `rememberMeCheckBox` 。This example requires a control named `usernameTextBox`, a control named `passwordTextBox`, and a control named `rememberMeCheckBox`. [!code-csharp[ClientApplicationServices#307](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/CS/Class1.cs#307)] [!code-vb[ClientApplicationServices#307](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClientApplicationServices/VB/Class1.vb#307)]

span.span: if the user was authenticated; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用客户端应用程序服务通过 forms 身份验证来验证用户。You can use client application services to validate users by using forms authentication. 若要验证用户，通常会调用 `static` 方法，该方法在内部调用 方法。To validate users, you will typically call the `static` method, which internally calls the method. 或者，您可以直接调用 方法。Alternatively, you can call the method directly. 可以调用此重载来访问参数所指定的位置的身份验证服务 `serviceUri` 。You can call this overload to access an authentication service at the location specified by the `serviceUri` parameter. 使用此重载是设置 属性和调用重载的替代方法 。Using this overload is an alternative to setting the property and calling the overload. ## Examples 下面的示例代码演示如何使用此方法通过指定位置的身份验证服务来验证用户。The following example code demonstrates how to use this method to validate the user through an authentication service at a specified location. 在应用程序代码中从登录控件检索用户凭据。The user credentials are retrieved from login controls in your application code. 此示例需要名为的 控件 `usernameTextBox` 和 名为的控件 `passwordTextBox` 。This example requires a control named `usernameTextBox` and a control named `passwordTextBox`.
